title: Python Prophecies
description: Master the ancient serpent's wisdom through data divination and automation sorcery

lessons.title: The Serpent's Awakening
lessons.description: Install Python and set up your mystical development environment
codeExamples: # This is a comment\nmagic_level = 1\nprint(f"Your magic level: {magic_level}")

lessons.title: Sacred Syntax and Indentation
lessons.description: Learn the serpent's unique language structure and whitespace magic
codeExamples:
# Proper indentation
if magic_level > 5:
    print("Powerful wizard!")
    cast_spell("fireball")

# f-string formatting
name = "Merlin"
age = 1000
print(f"The wizard {name} is {age} years old")
# Multiple assignment\nx, y, z = 1, 2, 3\nprint(f"x={x}, y={y}, z={z}")

lessons.title: Elemental Data Types
lessons.description: Master strings, numbers, lists, and dictionaries in Python
codeExamples:
# Working with different data types
name = "Wizard"
level = 10
spells = ["fireball", "heal"]
stats = {"health": 100, "mana": 50}
print(f"{name} (Level {level}) knows {len(spells)} spells")
exercises: Create a list of your favorite spells and add a new spell to it
Build a dictionary representing a wizard with name, level, and spells
Use string methods to format a spell incantation
Convert a string of comma-separated elements into a list
